name: Happy Empire - The Marriage Voyage
detailed_description:
We are proud to present our new game – Happy Empire - The Marriage Voyage. In this strategy/adventure game, Princess Leya and Prince Hervald go on honeymoon across their homeland that was damaged during the last war. During their journey, they will find rare caves and meet good and evil heroes. They will have to manage their resources smart and cooperate with different characters. And they will face a lot of challenges and obstacles on their way.

This game will touch feeling of both boys and girls. Arcana and challenges are intertwined in a single story of the The Marriage Voyage game.

Help Princess Leya and Prince Hervald in their challenging journey and struggle for the Empire!

More About the Game:


  • Colorful graphics
  • Great emotions!!!
  • Game as part of a big story with rich storyline
  • 4 amazing worlds to visit
  • 64 challenging achievements
  • 81 unique levels

short_description: Meet good and evil heroes and progress through the Empire by using their help. Let the honeymoon end happily! Defeat the Evil Wizard and return home victorious!
